tool.name: Codon Variants
tool.description: Identifies codon variants and non-synonymous/synonymous mutations
tool.command:
ln -f -s '${input_bam.metadata.bam_index}' '${input_bam}.bai' && quasitools call codonvar '$input_bam' '$ref_file' '$offset' '$input_genes'
#if $output: -o '$output_name' #end if
#if $error_rate: -e '$error_rate' #end if

param.name: error_rate
param.label: Error rate
param.help: Estimated sequencing error rate. Defaults to 0.01.

param.name: output_name
param.label: Output name
param.help: Name of the output vcf file. Defaults to output.vcf.
